ffg-star-wars-enhancements.opening-crawl: Tokens with a friendly disposition will be named to NPC; tokens with any other disposition will be set to NPC
Provide music to play during the opening crawl. The crawl is timed with the original audio with 8-9 seconds of silence.
Provide an alternative logo for the opening crawl. The default logo uses a copyright safe font.
